full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 747 Filed 08/10/22 Page 106 of 228 782 LC2Qmax3 Alessi - Direct
1 Q. About when did you first meet Ms. Maxwell?
2 A. I met Ms. Maxwell around 1991.
3 Q. Do you know her full name?
4 A. Ms. Ghislaine Maxwell.
5 Q. When you first met Ms. Maxwell, what did she look like?
6 A. She was a pretty girl, tall, brunette.
7 Q. For how long did you know Ms. Maxwell?
8 A. Since I -- since she came to the house until I left.
9 Q. In 2002?
10 A. Yes.
11 Q. Do you think you would recognize her in person again?
12 person again?
13 A. Yes.
14 Q. Do you see her in the courtroom today?
15 A. Yes, I think she is with a black sweater.
16 Q. Would you please point her out?
17 A. (Indicating) At the corner.
18 MS. COMEY: Would the record please reflect that the witness has identified the defendant?
19
20 THE COURT: The record so reflects.
21 Q. Mr. Alessi, about how often did you interact with
22 Ms. Maxwell while you were working for Mr. Epstein?
23 A. On a daily basis.
24 Q. Why did you interact with her on a daily basis?
25 A. Because I had all the orders from Mr. Epstein where I
SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300
DOJ-OGR-00017979
